## R Markdown
```{r}
df <- read.csv("cleaned_tweets.csv")
```


```{r}
library("tidytext")
library("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
df <- df %>% 
  unnest_tokens("word","text")
```
```{r}
df
```



```{r}
df_putin <- df %>% 
  filter(str_detect(hashtags,"Putin") & !str_detect(hashtags,"Zelensky")) 
```

```{r}
df_zelen <- df %>% 
  filter(!str_detect(hashtags,"Putin") & str_detect(hashtags,"Zelensky"))
```
```{r}
df_putin %>% 
  count(location,word) %>% 
  group_by(location) %>% 
  top_n(n,n=10) %>% 
  arrange(., n) %>% 
  filter(n>50)
```

```{r}
putin_freq <- df_putin %>% 
  count(word) %>% 
  top_n(n,n=30) %>% 
  arrange(n)
  
```

```{r}
zelen_freq <- df_zelen %>% 
  count(word) %>% 
  top_n(n,n=30) %>% 
  arrange(n)
```


```{r}
write.csv(putin_freq,'putin_freq.csv')
write.csv(zelen_freq,'zelen_freq.csv')
```
